mapper.select: select id ,iaas_type ,key_config_name ,default_config_id ,key_file_name ,domain ,country_code ,city ,company ,job_title ,email_address ,create_user_id ,create_date ,update_user_id ,update_date from ieda_cf_key_config ORDER BY id;

select id ,iaas_type ,key_config_name ,default_config_id ,key_file_name ,domain ,country_code ,city ,company ,job_title ,email_address ,create_user_id ,create_date ,update_user_id ,update_date from ieda_cf_key_config where id = #{id};
select count(*) from ieda_cf_key_config where key_config_name = #{keyConfigName};
mapper.insert: insert into ieda_cf_key_config( id, iaas_type, key_config_name, default_config_id, key_file_name, domain, country_code, city, company, job_title, email_address, create_user_id, create_date, update_user_id, update_date ) Values ( #{vo.id}, #{vo.iaasType}, #{vo.keyConfigName}, #{vo.defaultConfigInfo}, #{vo.keyFileName}, #{vo.domain}, #{vo.countryCode}, #{vo.city}, #{vo.company}, #{vo.jobTitle}, #{vo.emailAddress}, #{vo.createUserId}, now(), #{vo.updateUserId}, now() )
mapper.update: update ieda_cf_key_config set iaas_type = #{vo.iaasType}, key_config_name = #{vo.keyConfigName}, default_config_id = #{vo.defaultConfigInfo}, key_file_name = #{vo.keyFileName}, domain = #{vo.domain}, country_code = #{vo.countryCode}, city = #{vo.city}, job_title = #{vo.company}, email_address = #{vo.emailAddress}, update_user_id = #{vo.updateUserId}, update_date = now() where id = #{vo.id}
